definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

pinyin: Lan2 Zheng4 Chang2 cheng2 pin3 you2 guan3 dao4

sentences.english: It was butane vapor, leaking from a corroded steel pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 那是從腐蝕的鋼製石油管道中泄露的丁烷蒸汽。

sentences.english: The water runs through by means of this conduit.
sentences.chinese: 水通過這個管道流過去。

sentences.english: The water was shut off for several hours while the plumber repaired the pipes.
sentences.chinese: 管子工修理管道時，水的供應中斷了幾個小時。

sentences.english: The product can be used piping system shut-off valve, control valves and check valves.
sentences.chinese: 該產品可用做管道系統的切斷閥，控制閥和止回閥。

sentences.english: The report said the pipeline agency was hampered by a chronic inspector shortage.
sentences.chinese: 報告說，長期缺乏檢查員妨礙了管道安全局開展工作。

sentences.english: The deal was agreed last year and construction is expected to begin soon.
sentences.chinese: 這項輸油管道協議去年達成，修築工程預計很快開工。

sentences.english: This application calls for a much larger Hawse pipe valve.
sentences.chinese: 這個應用就要求更大的錨鏈管道閥門。

sentences.english: Suitable for multi-core arbitrary combination, dead weight is light, easy to manage duct laying.
sentences.chinese: 適合大芯數任意組合，自重輕能防潮，適合管道敷設。

sentences.english: With the arrival of winter, the snow and ice would help to cover the pipeline.
sentences.chinese: 隨着冬天的來臨，冰雪會將管道遮蓋住。

sentences.english: Repair leaking water pipe in starboard deck.
By the end of 2001, natural gas conveyer pipeline can be laid down to our factory.
sentences.chinese: 2001年底，天然氣輸送管道即可鋪設至天津鹼廠。

sentences.english: The workers are laying pipes under the road.
sentences.chinese: 工人們正在道路下面鋪設管道。

sentences.english: Tubes are generally mounted on truck-trailer chassis, referred to as tube trailers.
sentences.chinese: 管道一般是安裝在拖車底座上，稱作管道拖車。

sentences.english: Tubes are generally mounted on truck-trailer chassis, referred to as tube trailers.
sentences.chinese: 管道一般是安裝在拖車底座上，稱作管道拖車。

sentences.english: The expansion process of heat-shrinkable sleeve was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了管道防腐用熱縮圓套的擴張工藝。

sentences.english: The high temperature valve is suitable for sealing high-temperature pipelines in the production process of titanium sponge.
sentences.chinese: 適用作海綿鈦生產過程中密封高溫管道使用。

definition: pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
Guanzi or Guan Zhong 管仲 (-645 BC), famous politician of Qi 齊國|齐国 of Spring and Autumn period/Guanzi, classical book containing writings of Guan Zhong and his school
